name: Chain Solitaire
description:
Chain Solitaire is my own variant of One Hand Solitaire. It adds a lot more strategy in the fact that its nonlinear and you can look through the whole deck. Look for the 3 patterns to strategically remove cards to bring your hand down to 2 or less cards. The programming, art (aside from the cards graphics), sound effects, and music were all made by me.
